ELEMENT.CREATOR: JT
ELEMENT.TITLE: 3 Image with prodlist
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: 3 images across the top followed by the description, msrp, price and add to cart. beneath that is a prodlist.
ELEMENT.SHORT: Contains default description (HTML Editor), 3 images (1 500 x 180 with two 250 x 250 below) MSRP, Price and a prodlist with the product name, 75 x 75 thumb, 120 character description and add to cart/more details links. Product list style can NOT be changed.

ELEMENT.HELP: Please enter the first picture for your product.
Please enter the first picture for your product.
Please enter the first picture for your product.
This is the default product description that will appear on your website.
This is the msrp that will appear crossed out on your website.
You can add products to your homepage, when you do they will appear below.
ELEMENT.HTML:
